title: UK Typophiles : Max Kisman talks in Newcastle : April 23rd
content:
I thought any UK Typophiles might be interested to know that Max Kisman is in the UK on April 23rd to give a talk in Newcastle upon Tyne.   
   
You can book tickets via : [http://www.adesignassociation.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20060529195223/http:/www.adesignassociation.org/)
author: union
